players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "Bob is the mafioso, I investigated him last night and found out his true role."
You: "Be careful, the mafioso might be among us. I suggest we keep an eye on Diana since she accused me."
Diana: "Since Bob is the mafioso, we should focus on investigating Charlie and Alice to find out who else might be working with him."
